title: Digby company gets approval from Health Canada to make hand sanitizer
description: When skin care entrepreneur Eliza Desmarais got the news Tuesday night that Health Canada had approved her Digby  N S  company to produce hand sanitizer  it came not a moment too soon because the COVID   pandemic has put her in a financial squeeze
